properties.name: opentracing.spring.cloud.async.enabled
properties.description: Enable tracing for @Async, Executor and WebAsyncTask/Callable.

properties.name: opentracing.spring.cloud.hystrix.strategy.enabled
properties.description: Enable Propagation of spans across threads using in Hystrix command tracing.

properties.name: opentracing.spring.cloud.log.enabled
properties.description: Add standard logging output to tracing system.

properties.name: opentracing.spring.cloud.jdbc.withActiveSpanOnly
properties.description: Only trace JDBC calls if they are part of an active Span.

properties.name: opentracing.spring.cloud.jdbc.ignoreStatements
properties.description: Set of JDBC statements to not trace.
